data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Weigmann, Simon, Guerrero-Kommritz, Jürgen (2009): New species of Neotanais Beddard, 1886 (Crustacea, Tanaidacea) from the deep sea of the tropical and southern East Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 1992: 20-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185563
